name: The Caves of Dirt
description:
Controls:

  • Move: arrow keys / A, D
  • Jump: Z / space
  • Dig / Place: X / E

Press R to restart the current screen if you get stuck

Description:

A puzzle-platformer built for Ludum Dare 48! You must dig up blocks and move them to progress deeper and deeper into the Caves of Dirt. You have the ability to dig up blocks and then place them beneath you. Use them to get higher, remove obstacles, and create pathways. The goal is to keep going deeper into the caves until you reach the bottom!

This was my first game made using Godot, the the jam was a great learning experience!

Programs:

  • Game engine: Godot
  • Art: Aseprite
  • Sound: Bosca Ceoil, bfxr

Source Code: https://github.com/Blue0505/LD48-Jam-Game
